TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
You can create Column tool panel in Spread.Views to control the visibility of columns. It allows the user to choose the columns from the Column tool panel at run time to decide which column should be visible in the grid.

Column tool panel is supported by Grid Layout Engine and Horizontal Layout Engine.

After Grid initialisation, you can call "grid.options.showToolPanel=true/false" to show/hide the panel.

Below image show how a grid including record of company employees can be represented using Column tool panel which allows user to select the desirable column details.
